A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It's everything Star Wars was when I was a kid. Especially Empire. It shook us to our core. TLJ does that. After seeing twice already\, it is exactly what SW needs. To grow\, to change to become better than it's masters. I applaud the film. It's daring\, sometimes goofy\, sometimes cheesy but totally what I love and want from my galaxy. I love this film. As much as I love Empire. Thank you Rian for going where you did.
